message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $12000. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $11000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic value!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $10800. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price!

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
